content:
I totally understand! We've all been there - forgetting our lunch containers or plans and having to make a last-minute purchase. But, as you said, it can be a nice treat to indulge in something different every now and then.

Steaming is a fantastic way to reheat quinoa, and I'm sure it'll turn out perfectly. It's a gentle and moist-heat method that helps preserve the quinoa's texture and flavor.

By the way, I'm curious - what kind of sandwich did you end up getting from the deli? Was it a favorite of yours, or something new you wanted to try?
